Title: Like a Spider on the Wall
Description:
Inviting Alleria was a risk... but even at this moment, I feel it was worth taking. I know it was.

I will speak with her on my own. In the meantime, I'd like you to venture into the city above. The pheromones Nizrek gifted you will allow access into the Umbral Bazaar. Observe the merchants, listen to the conversations, purchase their goods.

This city is as vibrant as Stormwind. And its people are as worthy of freeing from abuse as our own. Experience for yourself how similar we all are.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Anduin Wrynn at the Alchemy Lab in the City of Threads.
RewardText:
A vibrant people, such as any other we've encountered together over the decades.

They deserve that same peace and protection that we seek for our own. 

Let us vow that, when forced to fight, it will always be against the source of strife. Never the victims of it.
